item.title: Version 2.0.14
item.description:
NameQuick v2.0.14

This release adds a redesigned templates grid with quick create and inline edits, plus layout polish and stability fixes.

Highlights

  • Watch folders: Instant delete sync from Finder with immediate list update.
  • Adds a redesigned templates grid with a dedicated “New Template” card.
  • Enables inline renaming directly on template cards.
  • Shows key fields at a glance; extra fields open in a popover.
  • Improves grid stability for consistent card sizes.
  • Extraction and post-processing fields: Uninterrupted typing — no more focus loss after the first character.

New

  • Templates grid: Browse templates in a clean, responsive grid (Templates tab).
  • “New Template” card: Create a template from the first slot.
  • Inline renaming: Double‑click a card title to rename.
  • Field chips: View key fields; open a popover for the full list.

Improvements

  • Template cards
    • Standardizes sizing for consistent rows.
    • Refines hover states and centers “New Template” content.
    • Moves actions to an overflow menu while keeping right‑click.
  • Template editor
    • Clarifies sections for extraction, formatting, and transforms.
    • Adds contextual help popovers for quick guidance.

Fixes

  • Prevents grid reflow caused by varying description or field lengths.
  • Keeps chip row height consistent for better alignment.
  • Maintains centered layout on the “New Template” card.
